TextBody:

Subject: Issues with DLP Reporting    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0CH9rE:ref ]

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000CH9rE:ref

Good morning

Cordial greetings, currently the DLP is presenting some inconsistencies 
in the report of the users where the agent is installed and in other 
equipment that is installed does not report and is not shown in the 
panel. In addition, the connection with the SIEM tool is not evident, 
since it is not reporting information either.

As proof, the following is attached

  * DLP no report




  * Connection with Wuazuh, which is the SIEM tool.




  * All options are activated and still not sending information to SIEM.




  * DLP listening configuration





  * No DLP report evidenced









El 25/06/24 a las 11:08, Netwrix Support escribió:
> Hi Juan,
>
> Could you please provide more details as to what logs are not present 
> and what is wrong with the SIEM integration?
> The attachments got lost along the way as they were not attached, so 
> can you please re-add them?
>
> Thank you,
> Eduard Nut
> Technical Support Engineer

> DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection
> eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
> CoSoSys Ltd
